docs.lead_paragraph: Readers respond to David Brooks's Nov. 30 column, "Waiting to Be Wooed."
docs.abstract: Readers respond to David Brooks's Nov. 30 column, "Waiting to Be Wooed." Don Kadlec, Fargo, N.D.: Care to know why I, an independent who frequently voted across party lines, vowed never to vote for a Republican again after the 2000 election? First, swiftboating. McCain, Kerry, and even Max Cleland, who left an arm and both [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: Two labs agreed to make 19 different anti-retroviral drugs designed for children available for about $60 a year.

docs.lead_paragraph: Long before outgrowing her pre-pregnancy wardrobe, a woman who is expecting will need to revamp her pre-pregnancy skin care routine.

docs.lead_paragraph: Americans’ complicated relationship with food and drink — in which everything desirable is also potentially dangerous — only becomes magnified in pregnancy.

headline.main: The Weighty Responsibility of Drinking for Two
headline.print_headline: The Weighty Responsibility Of Drinking for Two
